titles.title: Sensible Classification Act of 2023
Sensible Classification Act of 2023
To improve the classification and declassification of national security information, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committees on Intelligence (Permanent Select), and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy, Climate and Grid Security.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
